abilities.description: Your mech can @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} by firing a magnetically charged anchor and tether. On a hit, the grapple finds its target. When you may make a move leveraging this tether, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit. The grapple stays anchored until you score a miss on a move leveraging it or you take the time to detach it from your frame. Only one such grapple can be attached at a time.
